criteria.name: Thesis Statement
criteria.description: Clear, arguable thesis that guides the essay

levels.Excellent (90-100): Compelling, sophisticated thesis that shows deep understanding
levels.Good (80-89): Clear thesis that is arguable and appropriate
levels.Satisfactory (70-79): Thesis present but could be stronger or clearer

criteria.name: Evidence & Support
criteria.description: Use of relevant evidence to support arguments

levels.Excellent (90-100): Exceptional use of relevant, well-integrated evidence
levels.Good (80-89): Strong evidence that supports main points
levels.Satisfactory (70-79): Adequate evidence, but could be stronger

criteria.name: Organization
criteria.description: Logical structure and flow of ideas

levels.Needs Improvement (60-69): Many errors that distract from content
